constraints.name: path_similarity
constraints.description: 两个路径数组的相似度定义为最大的 i 满足对于所有 1 ≤ j ≤ i，都有 b_j = a_j + j。如果不存在这样的 i，则相似度为 0。
constraints.formal: LRP(a, b) = max(i) such that for all 1 ≤ j ≤ i, b_j = a_j + j. If no such i exists, LRP(a, b) = 0.

constraints.name: tree_modification
constraints.description: 可以动态地向树中添加新节点，并建立一条无向边连接到现有节点。
constraints.formal: Add a new node with weight w' and connect it to an existing node u.

constraints.name: path_extraction
constraints.description: 从树中提取两个简单路径上的权值数组 a 和 b。
constraints.formal: Extract arrays a and b from the simple paths u1 -> v1 and u2 -> v2 respectively.
